column1: Create a skill called `database-backup` that helps automate database backup operations with scheduling and validation
Create a skill called `docker-deploy` that assists with containerized application deployment to various environments
Create a skill called `api-test` that helps test REST APIs with automated request generation and response validation
Create a skill called `log-analyzer` that analyzes application logs for errors, patterns, and performance metrics
Create a skill called `git-workflow` that streamlines common git operations like branch management and PR creation
Create a skill called `security-audit` that performs security checks on code and dependencies
Create a skill called `performance-profiler` that helps profile and optimize application performance
Create a skill called `data-migration` that assists with database schema and data migration tasks
Create a skill called `ci-pipeline` that helps set up and configure CI/CD pipelines
Create a skill called `monitoring-setup` that configures application monitoring and alerting
